    • Method Detail

      • canShiftPiece

        public boolean canShiftPiece(Piece p,
                             Tile start)
        This method determines if the given piece can be added to the puzzle board or not. It is same as the canAddPiece method except that a piece can shift to overlap itself.
        Overrides:
        canShiftPiece in class Board
        Parameters:
        p - The current piece which is being added
        start - The start reference tile of the piece which is being added
        Returns:
        True if the piece can be added and false if the piece can not be added

      • shiftPiece

        public void shiftPiece(Piece p,
                       Tile start)
        Shifts a piece on the board to another valid location on the board.
        Overrides:
        shiftPiece in class Board
        Parameters:
        p - The piece to be shifted
        start - The start reference tile of the piece which is being shifted

      • copy

        public PuzzleBoard copy()
        The method to copy the puzzle board.
        Specified by:
        copy in class Board
        Returns:
        The copied puzzle board

      • canRemovePiece

        public boolean canRemovePiece(Piece p)
        Method to determine if the piece can be removed from the board. Can always remove pieces from the puzzle boards.
        Overrides:
        canRemovePiece in class Board
        Parameters:
        p - The current piece which is selected
        Returns:
        True as we can always remove pieces from the puzzle board
